text:
Ah!
[Player]-saan!!

name: Yohack
text:
Hello!
Heheh, I'm so happy to see you!

name: Yohack
text:
Um...
I'm really sorry for
calling you so suddenly!

name: Yohack
text:
Actually, the other day,
I worked with someone from Earth and heard a lot of stories.

name: Yohack
text:
And, I heard that Earth has tons of festivals,
and they're all super exciting!

name: Yohack
text:
The last time I came to Earth, it was Halloween,
and that was so similar to my hometown's festival that I was really surprised—

name: Yohack
text:
There's also Christmas and New Year's...
you have festivals all year round!

name: Yohack
text: Um, and about that...

name: Yohack
text:
I heard there's a festival now called Valentine's,
where you convey your feelings,
so I wanted to give this to [Player]-san—

name: Yohack
text:
Here!
It's chocolate I made, please accept it!

name: Yohack
text:
Heheh!
It's packed tight with my feelings of 'I love you'!

name: Yohack
text:
I'm glad I could participate in such a wonderful festival!
Go ahead and try it—

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san,
is this possibly...
chocolate for me?

name: Yohack
text:
I-I completely understand!
[Player]-san, thank you!

name: Yohack
text:
Heheh... it's not just about giving feelings,
but having them returned.
This is my first time experiencing this festival, but—

name: Yohack
text:
I'm so, so happy!
[Player]-san, is it okay if I open it?

name: Yohack
text:
Whoa!
It's super sweet and delicious!
It's like, the taste of happiness!

name: Yohack
text:
If you'd like, please try mine,
it's my masterpiece!

name: Yohack
text:
Heheh, when you eat it so deliciously,
it makes me happy too!

name: Yohack
text:
...Oh, that's right!
I just thought of something great, [Player]-san!

name: Yohack
text:
If both are delicious and make us happy,
I think we'd be even happier if we shared each other's chocolate!

name: Yohack
text:
So...
[Player]-san, please!
Here, open wide!

name: Yohack
text:
Heheh, I'm having fun!
Let's celebrate together again next year,
and the year after that too!
